title: Tree-like view for Source Files in Dev Tools
body:
In app where there are 1000 TypeScript files in multiple projects, I have file name duplicates.
After compiling with source maps, I'm unable to locate any of those duplicated files as I have to click through each such file until desired is found.

comments.body: Duplicate of https://wpdev.uservoice.com/forums/257854-microsoft-edge-developer/suggestions/8473534-add-folders-to-f12-dev-tool-script-sources - it has more votes than this one
